data.title: History Of Vacuum Science And Technology by Madey, Theodore E. And William C. Brown [editors]: Near Fine Soft cover
data.meta_description: Soft cover - Published for the American Vacuum Society by the American Institute of Physics - Condition: Near Fine - 8vo (imperial). [1984. N.p.] A special volume commemorating the 30th anniversary of the American Vacuum Society, 1953-1983. Original cream card wraps, sewn and glued binding. vii, 168 p.p. Illustrated in B&W. Bruising to spine head and fore edge of front cover. - History Of Vacuum Science And Technology

Terms of Sale:

Shipping Terms:

All prices listed in Canadian dollars. We guarentee that all items are properly packaged and handled with care. Please allow one to two business days for your order to be shipped. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required. All sales will be shipped with a tracking number for your convenience.
